game_description: Life Simulator VR is a language learning service that trains your "ears" and "vocabulary" by clearing various missions in a variety of everyday situations.Let's train your vocabulary and listening skills in a fun way! You can challenge over 100 missions such as "cook food", "put the basketball in the goal", "buy food within $30", etc. in various scenes such as "in the house", "in the park", "in the supermarket", etc.
